creator: sivakumar.nittala@jpmorgan.com
text:
While starting Catalina server it give the following error 

The system cannot find the file -Dsun.io.useCanonCaches=false

I guess the above is a system property.

any info regarding this?

Thanks 

Sivakumar

I (and many others) do not experience this problem. This looks like a 
configuration issue. Please use tomcat user to resolve these types of issues.
creator: medthomas@ntlworld.com
